meta.name: description
meta.content: The Redondo Beach Unified School District is located in Redondo Beach, California.

div.span: Regular Board of Education (Teleconferenced) Meeting - Tuesday April 28, 2020 at 11:00AM

img.h1: Redondo Beach Unified School District Home

a.span: Patricia Dreizler Continuation High School/RBUSD Independent Study

h2.a: Welcome to Redondo Beach Unified School District

div.div:
Passionate, progressive, positive.
At the Redondo Beach Unified School District, we promote and celebrate our students’ academic, social, emotional, and physical well-being. We take pride in fostering lifelong learning by providing the highest level of educational programs at each of our award-winning schools.

We’re committed to hiring, supporting, and promoting excellence and innovation in teaching and learning, maintaining high expectations for all students and staff, and ensuring safety and security in modernized learning environments. With respect and empathy, we welcome our families and our wonderfully diverse community in partnering with us on this important journey.

div.div: School News is a quarterly newsletter to promote the news of the district and each of the schools. The majority of the School News papers are distributed to the elementary school students to take home, to teachers and staff in all schools, door to door to selected individual homes and to selected business locations.
